Review Name: Fabulous! Review Description: AC is fantastic Cooling is great. At this price point 1.5 ton that too 5 Star with 4.74 iseer and only 835 unit per year no other brand comes near it. I ordered on 11th got on 13th on same day got call from lg service engineer for Installation they came early on 14 installed AC properly 5 stars to LG too for such great installation experience and thanks to flipkart too for great service. Only con i feel is not having a auto horizontal swing at this price point. Rest everything is great ac cools my 180 Sq ft hall in just 7 to 8 minutes.
